block.p: Jacqueline Karen Hutchinson, the daughter of Elaine Hutchinson of Brooklyn and John Hutchinson of Curacao, was married yesterday to Christopher Joseph Burls, a son of Carol Burls of Baton Rouge, La., and William Burls of Dallas. The Rev. Kirkton J. Lashley, a United Methodist minister, performed the ceremony at the Memorial Presbyterian Church in Brooklyn.
The bride and bridegroom received master's degrees in business administration from Duke University.

Jacqueline Karen Hutchinson, the daughter of Elaine Hutchinson of Brooklyn and John Hutchinson of Curacao, was married yesterday to Christopher Joseph Burls, a son of Carol Burls of Baton Rouge, La., and William Burls of Dallas. The Rev. Kirkton J. Lashley, a United Methodist minister, performed the ceremony at the Memorial Presbyterian Church in Brooklyn.
The bride and bridegroom received master's degrees in business administration from Duke University.
Mrs. Burls, 29, is a senior management consultant at Deloitte Consulting in Manhattan. She graduated from Williams College.
Mr. Burls, 28, is an associate for investment research and analysis at TH Lee.Putnam Internet Partners, a venture capital firm in Manhattan. He graduated magna cum laude from Florida A&M University.
